description.narrative: FMO’s financing will be used to finance the development of the Project which will be one of the first large scale solar PV plants in the country upon its completion. Bangladesh has abundant solar resource availability and the Project can assist Bangladesh in growing its power capacity with renewable sources to cover the rapid growing energy demand.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
